Boot Info Script 0.60    from 17 May 2011


============================= Boot Info Summary: ===============================

 => Grub Legacy (v0.97) is installed in the MBR of /dev/sda and looks on the 
    same drive in partition #4 for /boot/grub/stage2 and /boot/grub/menu.lst.

sda1: __________________________________________________________________________

    File system:       ntfs
    Boot sector type:  Grub2 (v1.99)
    Boot sector info:   Grub2 (v1.99) is installed in the boot sector of sda1 
                       and looks at sector 33720512 of the same hard drive 
                       for core.img, but core.img can not be found at this 
                       location. No errors found in the Boot Parameter Block.
    Operating System:  Windows XP
    Boot files:        /boot.ini /ntldr /NTDETECT.COM

sda2: __________________________________________________________________________

    File system:       swap
    Boot sector type:  -
    Boot sector info:  

sda3: __________________________________________________________________________

    File system:       Extended Partition
    Boot sector type:  Unknown
    Boot sector info:

                       (PCLinuxOS) for i586 Kernel 2.6.38.8-pclos3.bfs on a 
                       Dual-processor i686 /
    Boot files:        /boot/grub/menu.lst /etc/fstab

================================ sda1/boot.ini: ================================

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[boot loader]

timeout=30

default=multi(0)disk(0)rdisk(0)partition(1)\WINDOWS

[operating systems]

multi(0)disk(0)rdisk(0)partition(1)\WINDOWS="Microsoft Windows XP Home Edition" /noexecute=optin /fastdetect

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

=========================== sda4/boot/grub/menu.lst: ===========================

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
timeout 5
color black/cyan yellow/cyan
gfxmenu (hd0,3)/boot/gfxmenu
default 0

title linux
kernel (hd0,3)/boot/vmlinuz BOOT_IMAGE=linux root=UUID=03f05874-ddcb-4612-ad1d-30014ee27a8a quiet vmalloc=256M acpi=on resume=UUID=655a536f-d7b6-44f5-a1ee-493de33139ee vga=788
initrd (hd0,3)/boot/initrd.img

title linux-nonfb
kernel (hd0,3)/boot/vmlinuz BOOT_IMAGE=linux-nonfb root=UUID=03f05874-ddcb-4612-ad1d-30014ee27a8a quiet vmalloc=256M acpi=on resume=UUID=655a536f-d7b6-44f5-a1ee-493de33139ee
initrd (hd0,3)/boot/initrd.img

title failsafe
kernel (hd0,3)/boot/vmlinuz BOOT_IMAGE=failsafe root=UUID=03f05874-ddcb-4612-ad1d-30014ee27a8a quiet failsafe vmalloc=256M acpi=on
initrd (hd0,3)/boot/initrd.img

title Windows XP
rootnoverify (hd0,0)
makeactive
chainloader +1
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

=============================== sda4/etc/fstab: ================================

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Entry for /dev/sda4 :
UUID=03f05874-ddcb-4612-ad1d-30014ee27a8a / ext3 defaults 1 1
# Entry for /dev/sda6 :
UUID=7968018f-d30a-4c4b-a59a-22b1f256d598 /home ext3 defaults 1 2
none /proc proc defaults 0 0
# Entry for /dev/sda2 :
UUID=655a536f-d7b6-44f5-a1ee-493de33139ee swap swap defaults 0 0
none /dev/pts devpts defaults 0 0
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
